sqlCriteria.querySql:
select trade.seller_flag, trade.item_title, trade.tid, trade.buyer_nick, trade.multi_buyer_nick, tradeex.company_name, tradeex.company_code, tradeex.out_sid, trade.total_fee, trade.post_fee, trade.payment, trade.num, trade.status, trade.refund_status, trade.cod_status, buyer_rate, company_sp_trade, consignee_address_detail, consignee_town, consignee_area, consignee_city, consignee_province, shipping_address_detail, shipping_town, shipping_area, shipping_city, shipping_province, short_address, shipping_branch_name, shipping_branch_code, consignee_branch_name, consignee_branch_code, package_center_code, package_center_name, send_name, send_phone, short_address_fornormal, print_config, tradeex.is_express_print, tradeex.is_invoice_print, tradeex.express_print_time, tradeex.invoice_print_time, trade.created, trade.seller_memo, trade.buyer_message, trade.consign_time, trade.receiver_name, trade.receiver_state, trade.receiver_city, trade.receiver_district, trade.receiver_address, trade.receiver_zip, trade.receiver_mobile, trade.receiver_phone, trade.shipping_type, trade.pay_time, trade.trade_type, trade.buyer_alipay_no, trade.alipay_no, trade.tid as primaryKey
FROM TRADE left outer join tradeex on trade.tid=tradeex.tid where seller_can_rate>0
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade left outer join tradeex on trade.tid=tradeex.tid where seller_can_rate>0
sqlCriteria.primaryKeySql: select tid from trade where seller_can_rate>0

sqlCriteria.querySql:
select trade.seller_flag, trade.item_title, trade.tid, trade.buyer_nick, trade.multi_buyer_nick, tradeex.company_name, tradeex.company_code, tradeex.out_sid, trade.total_fee, trade.post_fee, trade.payment, trade.num, trade.status, trade.refund_status, trade.cod_status, buyer_rate, company_sp_trade, consignee_address_detail, consignee_town, consignee_area, consignee_city, consignee_province, shipping_address_detail, shipping_town, shipping_area, shipping_city, shipping_province, short_address, shipping_branch_name, shipping_branch_code, consignee_branch_name, consignee_branch_code, package_center_code, package_center_name, send_name, send_phone, short_address_fornormal, print_config, tradeex.is_express_print, tradeex.is_invoice_print, tradeex.express_print_time, tradeex.invoice_print_time, trade.created, trade.seller_memo, trade.buyer_message, trade.consign_time, trade.receiver_name, trade.receiver_state, trade.receiver_city, trade.receiver_district, trade.receiver_address, trade.receiver_zip, trade.receiver_mobile, trade.receiver_phone, trade.shipping_type, trade.pay_time, trade.trade_type, trade.buyer_alipay_no, trade.alipay_no, trade.tid as primaryKey
FROM TRADE left outer join tradeex on trade.tid=tradeex.tid where trade.refund_status between 1 and 4
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade left outer join tradeex on trade.tid=tradeex.tid where trade.refund_status between 1 and 4
sqlCriteria.primaryKeySql: select tid from trade where trade.refund_status between 1 and 4
